app.name: WiiMedic
app.long_description:
WiiMedic is a comprehensive diagnostic and health monitoring tool for the Nintendo Wii.
As Wii consoles age, hardware issues become more common. WiiMedic gives you a complete picture of your system's health in one place.
FEATURES: - System Information: View hardware revision, firmware, region, video mode, memory stats - NAND Health Check: Scan NAND filesystem for usage, free space, and potential issues with visual bar graphs - IOS Installation Scan: Audit all installed IOS versions, detect stubs, custom IOS, and missing critical IOS - Storage Speed Test: Benchmark SD card and USB drive read/write speeds with performance ratings - Controller Diagnostics: Test GameCube controller ports and Wii Remote connections, detect stick drift - Network Test: Check WiFi module, IP configuration, and internet connectivity with latency measurement - Full Report Generator: Save a comprehensive text report to SD card that you can share online for community help
Perfect for: - Diagnosing hardware issues on aging Wiis - Verifying your softmod setup is correct - Testing second-hand Wii consoles before buying - Sharing system info when asking for help on forums - Checking storage device compatibility and speed
Navigation: Use D-Pad UP/DOWN to navigate, A to select, HOME to exit.
